description: This file defines the NotesListActivity class, which serves as the main screen for listing notes in a note-taking Android application. It includes UI setup, data retrieval from NotesRepository, and user interactions such as opening editors and deleting notes.

classes.name: NotesListActivity
classes.description: Main activity displaying a list of notes with options to create, view, and delete notes.

methods.name: onCreate
methods.description: Initializes the activity, sets up UI components, and prepares the notes list.

methods.name: onResume
methods.description: Refreshes the notes list when the activity resumes.

methods.name: openEditor
methods.description: Starts the NoteEditorActivity, optionally with a specific note ID.

methods.name: confirmDelete
methods.description: Deletes a note and refreshes the list.

methods.name: refresh
methods.description: Fetches notes from the repository and updates the UI list and empty view visibility.

methods.name: onDestroy
methods.description: Cancels ongoing coroutines when the activity is destroyed.
